product_name: Rocky Mounts LiftOp Ski/Snowboard Mounts - Small
long_description: The small Rocky Mounts LiftOp ski and snowboard mount carries up to 3 pairs of fat skis or 2 snowboards for convenient portage to your favorite snowy destination. One-touch push-button lever opening makes it simple to operate. 16 in. of plush padding securely holds skis/snowboards in place. Formfitting cable mounts fit all round, square and factory racks; all mounting hardware and tools are included. Additional mounting option is included for integration into Audi, VW, BMW, Volvo, Mini, Rhino, Aeroblade(R) and Whispbar(R) systems. The small Rocky Mounts LiftOp ski and snowboard mount includes locks to lock rack to car and skis/snowboards to rack.
short_description: The small Rocky Mounts LiftOp ski and snowboard mount carries up to 3 pairs of fat skis or 2 snowboards for convenient portage to your favorite snowy destination.
